snippet: Robert Schroeder, a Republican from Washington Township in Bergen County, was arrested and charged with writing nearly $400,000 in bad checks from his business accounts to two investors.
lead_paragraph: Robert Schroeder, a Republican from Washington Township in Bergen County, was arrested and charged with writing nearly $400,000 in bad checks from his business accounts to two investors.

headline.seo: New Jersey Assemblyman Robert Schroeder Charged With Writing Bad Checks
headline.main: New Jersey Assemblyman Charged With Writing Bad Checks
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Assemblyman Charged With Writing Bad Checks
